definition: article/commodity/product/goods/kind/grade/rank/character/disposition/nature/temperament/variety/to taste sth/to sample/to criticize/to comment/to judge/to size up/fret (on a guitar or lute)
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Red strains of Delicious are being planted.
sentences.chinese: 元帅的红色品系也有栽植。

sentences.english: This is a pure Chinese medicine, a true panacea against hypertension.
sentences.chinese: 本品系纯中药制品，实为治高血压之灵丹妙药。

sentences.english: With these types of varieties, low-cost, high-margin containers could easily be created.
sentences.chinese: 有了这些品系，低成本高利润的容器绰手可得。

sentences.english: The SW have strong ability on cold tolerance.
sentences.chinese: 越冬品系具有很强的耐低温能力。

sentences.english: Today, there are those who claim to have representatives of the Sion strain especially in the U.
sentences.chinese: 如今在美国有着许多拥戴西翁品系的无数代言人。

sentences.english: In cases of parallel evolution, two or more lineages evolve along similar lines.
sentences.chinese: 就平行进化而言，两个或更多的血统沿相似品系进化。

sentences.english: This strain of wheat can grow during a cold spring.
sentences.chinese: 这种品系的小麦能在寒冷的春天生长。

sentences.english: China is an important producer of the Yali pear (Pyrus bertschneideri Reld).
sentences.chinese: 鸭梨属于白梨品系，中国是鸭梨的主要产地。

sentences.english: However, a considerable degree of caution should be taken in the use of any or all color strains.
sentences.chinese: 但是，在应用某一个或全部着色品系时必需相当谨慎。

sentences.english: Objective: To evaluate the effects of zinc oxide nano-materials in splenic lymphocytes mixed culture from different strains of mice.
sentences.chinese: 对不同品系小鼠脾淋巴细胞混合培养的影响。

sentences.english: These new germplasm materials all were the very valuable materials in the cotton breeding.
sentences.chinese: 这些新的品系和种质材料丰富了陆地棉的遗传基础。

sentences.english: Of these fine lines are the masses of the mutant selection results.
sentences.chinese: 南丰蜜桔的这些优良品系是群众性的芽变选种的结果。

sentences.english: So the 4 strains had values of introduction in Fu'an city.
sentences.chinese: 这4个品系具有在福安市推广栽培的价值。

sentences.english: The re-growth of alfalfa with white flower had difference in different cutting.
sentences.chinese: 同一品系白花苜蓿不同茬次的再生速度存在差异。

sentences.english: High quality dry tip green tea was chosen to fume with the jasmine .
sentences.chinese: 本品系选优质烘青银针绿茶，用茉莉花熏制而成。

sentences.english: It revealed that the lines selected from high fertility had superior yield potential.
sentences.chinese: 高肥下选择的品系具有较大的产量潜力。

definition: variant of 譜系|谱系[pu3 xi4]
allopolyploid (polyploid with chromosomes of different species)
